file_content.text:
Corellia has thrived under Imperial rule, yet still there are radicals who conspire with the Republic to uproot our stability.
One group of renegades has been causing power outages, ambushing peace-keeping forces, and sheltering other violent insurgents.
These rebels must be eliminated for the good of all Corellia. The Corellian government will gladly compensate whomever makes this so.
